articles.description: The hypothesis was generated by a 27-billion-parameter foundation model called Cell2Sentence-Scale 27B (C2S-Scale), developed by researchers at Google DeepMind and Yale University. Built on Google's open-source Gemma...
articles.content: The big picture: An AI model jointly developed by Google and Yale University has produced a groundbreaking hypothesis about how cancer cells interact with the human immune system. Researchers believe… [+2966 chars]
